snippet.title: Cubic Crush: Streamer Showdown Trailer 2023 EN
snippet.description:
Come and show your skills in Cubic Crush Streamer Showdown! This 4D Tetris-style game is played in the rooms of your favorite Youtubers and offers different difficulty levels and missions to complete - use powerful powerups during the game to gain an advantage and advance even faster! Plus, in our interactive Twitch mode, your viewers can send you commands and help you succeed - unlock more rooms as you progress and become the king of Cubic Crush in this exciting challenge!

- 14 unique rooms

- 40 unlockable missions

- 6 powerups

- Twitch mode

- Tour mode

- 5 difficulty modes

- Beautiful colorful and stylish design!

Download Cubic Crush Streamer Showdown and join the fun now!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2249080/Cubic_Crush_Streamer_Showdown/
